meanings.definition: Producing only one type of spore.
meanings.sent1: The homosporous plant releases spores that are all the same.
meanings.sent2: The homosporous fern reproduces through a single type of spore.
meanings.sent3: The homosporous moss decided to throw a party for all its identical spores.
meanings.sent4: In the homosporous world of fungi, diversity comes from unity.
meanings.sent5: The homosporous spore floated gently in the breeze, a perfect replica of its parent plant.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the production of a single type of spore.
meanings.sent1: The homosporous organism creates spores that are all alike.
meanings.sent2: A homosporous life cycle involves the development of a single spore type.
meanings.sent3: The homosporous seedling was so proud of its uniform spore production.
meanings.sent4: The homosporous ecosystem thrived on its consistent spore generation.
meanings.sent5: Each homosporous spore carried the essence of its parent plant, a perfect copy in nature.
